data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Zaire to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zaire, Angola
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Zaire, Angola that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 4 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Zaire, Angola.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Zaire, Angola to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Chinese, general people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, train the church of Zaire, Angola to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the Word of God a delight to the people of Zaire, like it was to David.
data.verse: I delight in your decrees; I will not neglect your Word.

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Zaire.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

location.name: Zaire
location.people_groups_list: Ndombe, Holu, Simaa-Makoma, Mpinda, Pygmy, Bakwe
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Ndombe (49,000), Holu (54,000), Simaa-Makoma (3,700), Mpinda (32,000), Pygmy, Bakwe (23,000)
